channel.title: Posts on Wissen Xue Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Wissen Xue Blog

item.title: Raspberry Pi Time Machine
item.description: https://gregology.net/2018/09/raspberry-pi-time-machine/ This one is useful for the USB disk in fstab and delay mount in crontab https://github.com/odarriba/docker-timemachine I always use Docker as possible as I can to simplify the deployment

item.title: Mac OS X Backup in Single Mode
item.description: Backup files in Mac OS X single mode https://thinkinginsoftware.blogspot.com/2014/03/mac-osx-not-booting-make-backup-from.html https://alvinalexander.com/mac-os-x/mac-osx-single-user-mode-usb-drive https://jesperh.se/osx-backup-from-single-user-mode/ https://gist.github.com/kwcto/45e0b985071fad655e17 Migrating Outlook 2016 from one Mac to a new one https://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/msoffice/forum/all/migrating-outlook-2016-from-one-mac-to-a-new-one/e21b2fc2-b601-4abe-bcdc-bdedad876075

item.title: A quick notes on how to use Hugo to do personal publication
item.description: Hugo related Hugo Home Hugo directory structures Hugo Themes related https://themes.gohugo.io/hyde-hyde/ https://themes.gohugo.io/monopriv/ https://themes.gohugo.io/hugo-theme-introduction/ https://themes.gohugo.io/hugo-fresh/ hyde-hyde options https://petercheng.net/posts/website-v2-setup/ https://github.com/htr3n/hyde-hyde/blob/master/exampleSite/config.toml static sites hosting: surge.sh netlify static sites hosting reference: https://superdevresources.com/host-static-website-free/ https://www.slant.co/topics/2256/~best-static-website-hosting-provider Work with git submodule git submodule tutorials TODO customize the blog. (layout/color/Portfolio) publish to gitlab. study how to publish to surge.sh and netlify study Front Matter

item.title: The first post in this blog
item.description: This is my new blog hosting on github pages with Hugo, I will write my notes mostly in technical area and sometimes in other area such as thoughts, stories, ideas and life Hope this may help myself and others.
